title: Hiew 8.10 Registered [Gun-Ryo]
description:
<a href="http://www.hiew.ru/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://www.hiew.ru/</a>

Basically HIEW (Hacker`s view) is a hex viewer for those who need change some bytes in the code (usually 7xh to 0EBh). Also includes tools for: detailed dump of OMF/COFF object files and libraries, detailed dump of NE/LE/LX/PE/ELF executables, splitting and joining dual executables. Hiew is able to view unlimited length files in text/hex modes and in Pentium(R) Pro disassembler mode. Here are some key features of "Hiew":

Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· view and edit files of any length in text, hex, and decode modes 
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· x86-64 disassembler & assembler Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· physical & logical drive view & edit 
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· support for NE, LE, LX, PE, PE32+ and little-endian ELF executable formats 
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· support for Netware Loadable Modules like NLM, DSK, LAN,... 
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· following direct call/jmp instructions in any executable file with one touch 
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· pattern search in disassembler 
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· built-in simple 64bit decrypt/crypt system 
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· built-in powerful 64bit calculator 
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· block operations: read, write, fill, copy, move, insert, delete, crypt 
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· multifile search and replace 
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· keyboard macros Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· unicode support 
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Hiew Extrenal Module (HEM) support Limitations for the DEMO version: 
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· file size is limited to 150000 bytes 
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· no 64bit dis/assembler 
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· no ini-file processing 
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· no ordinal names 
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· no loading/storing keyboard macros in file 
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· no loading/storing crypt scripts in file 
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· crypt 32bit 
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· no progress bar 
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· no unicode support 
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· no HEM (Hiew External Module) support
